definition: perfectly straight/straight as a ramrod/bolt upright
pen/pencil/writing brush/to write or compose/the strokes of Chinese characters/classifier for sums of money, deals/CL:支[zhi1],枝[zhi1]
straight/to straighten/fair and reasonable/frank/straightforward/(indicates continuing motion or action)/vertical/vertical downward stroke in Chinese characters
surname Zhi/Zhi (c. 2000 BC), fifth of the legendary Flame Emperors 炎帝[Yan2 di4] descended from Shennong 神農|神农[Shen2 nong2] Farmer God

sentences.english: The soldiers stood at ramrod attention.
Straight forequarters is somewhat like a car without springs.
sentences.chinese: 笔直的前驱有些象一辆没有弹簧减震的汽车。

sentences.english: Keep going along Chang An Road and turn left at the first traffic lights.
sentences.chinese: 沿着长安路笔直走，到第一个红绿灯后左转。

sentences.english: The arrow went straight and hit the eye of the bird.
sentences.chinese: 箭笔直的飞出去，正中小鸟的那只眼睛。

sentences.english: She stood still as a mother seeing off the son heading to the battle field.
sentences.chinese: 她笔直地站着，如同一位送子出征的母亲。

sentences.english: The soldier stood stiff as a ramrod.
Erect poplars lined both sides of the road.
sentences.chinese: 道路两旁笔直的白杨排成行。
保持你的姿态笔直竖立。

sentences.english: Contract your abs and reverse the motion to return to the upright position.
sentences.chinese: 收腹同时做相反的动作来返回到笔直的姿态。
角度恰当的后膝关节和笔直的飞节。

sentences.english: Hesitant, but erect, he walked to the front of the room.
sentences.chinese: 他朝教堂走去，样子有点犹豫不决，身子却挺得笔直。

sentences.english: Taijijian (literally "Taiji Sword") is a straight two-edged sword used in the training of the Chinese martial art Taijiquan.
sentences.chinese: 太极剑是笔直的双刃剑，用于中国武术太极拳训练。

sentences.english: He was flying now straight down, at two hundred fourteen miles per hour.
sentences.chinese: 他现在是笔直地往下飞，时速二百一十四英里。

sentences.english: Its temperament is one of directness, independence and individuality.
sentences.chinese: 它的气质是笔直之一，独立和个性。

sentences.english: The fall line is the straightest way down the hill.
sentences.chinese: 滚落线指的是从山上滑下的最笔直的路线。

sentences.english: Her mother was sitting bolt upright, scrunching her white cotton gloves into a ball.
sentences.chinese: 她母亲坐得笔直，把她的白手套揉成了球状。

definition: (standing) very straight/straight as a ramrod/bolt upright/well-ironed/trim
to bend/to curve around/curved/crooked/to wind/to warp
waist and back/fig. upright and still healthy
